QuestData.Title: Fire From the Sky
QuestData.Description: Sullah wasn't kidding. That hill is crawling with troopers!$b$bJump on and paint our targets for me.$b$bMake every shot count, $n! We need to be able to get up there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 100 Schnottz Troopers while mounted on the Confiscated Artillery.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't think twice, $n.$b$bThese guys are rotten to the core.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $n.$b$bNow let's see if we can make our way up there before they're able to recover.
